website_summaries.verdict: Similar to others in its class with few complaints or concerns.
cons: More expensive than some comparable mats

customer_reviews.title: No Slip
customer_reviews.text: So at first I didn't think I was going to like this mat, I rolled it out and as i was doing Down Dog I was slipping so I contacted the Seller (they returned answer fast!) and they informed me to mist it with water as it is natural material. I took their advice of course... AND I have no problem. I DO recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, support, and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I don’t typically write reviews unless I’m extremely impressed or disappointed with something. This is an excellent quality yoga mat... The length is perfect for me and it provides a great amount of traction, support, and comfort. We just installed new hardwood flooring and my old mat just slipped around. The Repose mat stays where I put it, giving me a lot stability in my poses. The fact that it’s organic is a huge bonus for me as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: 100% would buy again or as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is amazing, very durable feeling but soft. Its quality is unlike any mat i've seen in stores! I just love laying on it I could almost take a nap. Its very unique and you cant ignore that its organic and recyclable! I would never throw it away but when I'm gone I can rest knowing it won't be taking up space in a landfill. I almost forgot to mention how great it is carrying strap is, very functional and doesn't dig in my shoulder. if you're thinking about a certain yogi in your life, definitely get this! they will use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best yoga mat, NO MORE wrist PAIN!
customer_reviews.text: Best yoga mat ever! Look no further! I’ve had years of wrist pain which is why yoga has always been so difficult for me, this Yoga Mat has changed everything for me. My wrists no longer hurt when I’m holding specific moves for longer periods of time. It’s also reassuring that bacteria does not grow on this mat. I would highly recommend this yoga mat to anyone! 5stars with me!
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: THEE yoga mat to get!
customer_reviews.text: The REPOSE cork yoga mat is seriously incredible! I have gone through many different mats and been on the hunt for one that is organic, doesn't smell, doesn't sleep when it gets wet or sweat drops -- and this is the one to get! I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cade Bittner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mat
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact that this mat is non-toxic & actually smells good. The only thing that keeps it from getting a five-star review is that I find it a bit more slippery than I'd hoped. I'm still hoping it will soften & become grippier with use (I've only had it for a couple of weeks). Size & cushioning are super, though, & it's really only a little slippery on things like lying-down cobbler's pose.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hope Schoenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cork mat!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mat for almost 6 months. I use it frequently (2-3 yoga classes a week) and it just gets better with every use. I sweat a lot and the cork surface absorbs moisture really well and prevents my hands from slipping. It is very well-made, durable and is obviously made from quality materials. Because of its thickness and the rubber backing, it’s heavier than other mats out there, but after a while you forget about the weight because this mat is just excellent! I highly recommend it. Everyone in my yoga class wanted to try it and folks were impressed. Even my cat, who normally scratches my previous mats, is happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Organic Cork Yoga Mat
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn’t like the mat because it was a little thicker than what I was looking for and a bit slippery. However, as time progresses I loveeeee my mat. The organic cork is nice and smooth, and like nothing I’ve seen before. The mat is XTRA long which is nice for my long legs. In warrior 2 my legs exceed the length of all other mats, but I couldn’t take up the entire length of this mat if I wanted to!!!! I would definitely recommend and I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Harris

customer_reviews.title: Best Cork Yoga Mat
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this yoga mat! Its perfect! The cushion is just right for a variety of styles of yoga, not soft and spongy, but a medium density, it gives the perfect support/cushion while still feeling stable. I have other cork mats that cost a lotmore and I definitely prefer this one. The cork surface feels the best of the other 2 Yoloha cork mats I have. I hope this mat last me a very long time but if not I will for-sure buy another.
customer_reviews.author: N.S.

customer_reviews.title: Cork peel
customer_reviews.text: The mat performed well during the first 20min of a hot yoga class but then immediately started to fall and peel apart. The parts that stayed were not slippery but the durability didn’t reflect the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality and Eco-Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I have been very satisfied with this product all around! It shipped quicker than expected. It was very important to me that I found a product that was quality and environmentally friendly and this mat was a perfect match! This mat is fairly light weight and is easily transportable with the strap included! I love that the material keeps me from slipping, but is still soft and comfortable. I highly recommend this mat to everybody! It is worth the investment for this eco-friendly, high quality product. I might grab a few more of these as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Yoga Mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat is beautiful. I found the amount of padding to be just right. The surface is very smooth, like a matte silicone feeling, which can feel a bit slippery. I haven't had issues with slipping though, and I actually like that there is not a "sticky sound" if I re-adjust in a posture. I also love the simple black carrying strap, and it can also be used for stretches. One thing to note, this mat is quite heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfortable yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this mat. Love that it's longer than many and that it's organic. I do not find it slippery, and when my hands or feet sweat, it's absorbed quickly. Love the DIY cleaner recommended by the company - that works great to keep the mat clean (and smells really good too)!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: This is THE ONE
customer_reviews.text: I looked around a lot for the "perfect" yoga mat and I finally found it! The Repose Eco-friendly cork mat is just the thing. It is longer than most, providing great grip and ease of movement. There are no plastic smells like the regular yoga mats. This smells clean and is so easy to care for. It is sturdy, holds up well to hours on end of yoga. Don't know why anyone would use any other mat. This is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Sabe

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat, I didn't like doing yoga on my regular old mat because when I got into it the mat felt sticky and it was gross. Everything about this mat is better to the huge length (I'm only 5'4") to the extra padding to the cute cork and easy carrying handle. It was a bit pricey but worth it if you like yoga. The best part is my husband started doing yoga with me on my old mat!
customer_reviews.author: 茉莉花

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! No slipping
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome mat. I teach yoga as well as practice almost daily, and I've always had issues finding a mat that my hands wouldn't slide on! I recently bought a jade harmony mat and had to return it due to my hands slipping on it even during downward dog. I decided to go with a different medium entirely with cork, and I'm so glad I did! Absolutely no slippage, even during hot yoga (100+ degrees) and this mat stays really clean as well. It's a little heavy but I like that about it - it stays put well. I would 100% recommend this mat - worth ever penny.
customer_reviews.author: Fabienne Sterckx

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, comfortable mat
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the shipping service as I bought the mat and initially said would arrive 3 weeks later for international shipping but, amazingly, it came 4 days later. Pros: Very comfortable/ Looks great/ Eco-friendly Cons: Compared to my Lulu mat, it can be slippery as my hands don't sweat a lot but I simply spray it water and it definitely grips better afterwards. Highly recommend to purchase from Repose if it's your first time buying a cork mat and not willing to splash out for more expensive ones like 42 Birds.
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for hot yoga
customer_reviews.text: This is based on 4 uses so far. I regularly go to hot yoga. (Vinyasa, Power, Yin and Sculpt) I’ve used cork as my primary may for 3 years now. (4-5 times a week) So I’m a heavy user of my mat. Specifically to this mat, fo far it is softer than my prior one with more squish. It is very grippy and even on the most humid room where I sweat even more. When doing floor stretches it is comfy on the back and sitting. It’s a good mat and I’m looking forward to seeing how it does over the next months.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Way better than standard mats
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed was the high quality of the mat. I love how different this mat is from other standard yoga mats. The eco-friendly, non-toxic materials make me feel great about my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Quality Yoga Mat
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try a cork yoga mat. I’m giving this 5 Stars because after a couple uses, I think this is a quality and durable yoga mat. It’s heavy, which could be a con I guess, but it stays in place and the rubber bottom feels great and provides the perfect amount of cushion in poses. The cork surface has no rubber smell and actually feels good to be on. If you’re not an avid yogi, I can’t promise you’ll notice a difference in a $70 mat over a $20 one. But I enjoy using it and i am happy with my purchase. Also it’s level on carpeting and I like that too
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa B

customer_reviews.title: I love the touch feel of this wonderful mat & I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the touch feel of this wonderful mat & I feel the nontoxic production in using it! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: readon

customer_reviews.title: High-quality
customer_reviews.text: Delivered super fast and I put to use right away! I am so excited about the natural materials, and the soft but non-slip feel.
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Great matt for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat for anyone the money. It's actually a great mat for twice the money. All of the 4mm dense cork mats I looked at previously were well over $100. My wife has one of those. She loves this mat. It's comfortable, super grippy (if that's a word), and super dense. That density does make this mat heavier than most, but it's still easy to sling with the included strap and carry to class. That strap was very helpful for a beginner like me to get deeper into a stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Owsiany

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for sure
customer_reviews.text: My lady friend and I are new I yoga and we needed mats. After reading the reviews I decided to try this mat and purchased two, one for each of us. It’s exactly what we were looking for, an eco friendly, comfy, and not at all slippery mat. We also tried the recipe they provide for cleaning the mats and it works perfectly. If you’re new to yoga like us I would definitely recommend this mat. It feels right at home.
customer_reviews.author: "yegster"

customer_reviews.title: Awesome yoga mat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat! It's a total game changer! It has almost no odor right out of the box. I love going to hot yoga knowing my mat won’t get slippery or stinky. It's also super light yet very comfortable. I recommend this mat to everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: SPEND THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: I am cheap! I thought why would you need to spend this much money on a yoga mat! Well this is the best yoga mat I have ever used! I do hot yoga and I sweat like a pig. I haven't slipped once on this mat. I don't have to cover my mat with towels anymore. Ive been following the directions for washing the mat and it is perfect. Buy it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alani

customer_reviews.title: Cork pieces start to flake off very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this mat but I have been using mine for several months now and there are a lot of pieces of cork that are coming off, leaving little holes here and there in the mat, which is bogus considering how much it costs. I've also talked to other yogis who I've seen with cork mats and none of us are happy with them, regardless of brand. So I just don't think cork mats are a good investment in general and I wouldn't recommend anyone buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Ann B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for hot yoga
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve used the mat for my hot yoga classes 4 times and I like it!! I seem to stay in place best when my hands and feet are wet with sweat! Or if the mat is a little wet. But other then that the mat seems to be great!! By the way my age is 30. And I’m a regular practicer of yoga! It’s a great mat to purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer88

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I am just in LOVE with this Yoga mat. Very Eco friendly and very smooth. The best part about it is that when you are doing your poses you won’t slip at all, it gives you a good grip for your hands and feet. The best!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Reid

customer_reviews.title: I love this mat
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat! You do not need a towel with the cork surface. In addition, this mat is longer than some which is nice to not have your feet or head off the mat. The feel has a nice cushion also on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth combs

customer_reviews.title: Slipping
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mat for over 6 months and use it 2 - 3 times per week for Vinyasa yoga. I have found that it very quickly developed smooth spots where hands and feet are generally positioned and these have become quite slippery. I have NOT used it for hot yoga where there is more moisture / sweat so do not know if being wet would make it more or less slippery but for my regular Vinyasa classes, I am about ready to give up on this mat and replace it with a Lululemon mat or something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Breaking down too quickly
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat’s ability to absorb sweat so that my hands do not slip at all in hot yoga. I will never use any other type mat again. However, after only owning it since January 12, 2020, it is already beginning to break down. Tiny flecks are coming off revealing the under surface. Very disappointed. Hoped to get at least one year out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this mat in my yoga practice
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this mat in my yoga practice. It has a very light rubber smell (only when you lie on the mat face down without a towel) and provides a good grip. I hope it will last long!
customer_reviews.author: anvik

customer_reviews.title: This product is a bit more expensive than some, ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is a bit more expensive than some, but less than others, but if you're looking for a quality map for yoga or exercise you will have NO REMORSE when you get it. It's really well made. I agree all the others out there giving it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: nikos1121

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SLIP RESISTANCE
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of cork, but after doing extensive research I found Repose Cork mat and they have a lot of amazing qualities in the mats, and within the company. I used the mat for the first time yesterday at class and wow!!! Didnt slip once! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Super good mat!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I am an Ashtanga practitioner, so daily practice. Only had the mat for a month, but is holding up good. Super good cushion. Fairly good grip when dry but super good as it gets a little wet. I used to require a yoga rug which now I don’t. Super happy! It is a little heavy and has a certain smell to it for a while, but what may doesn’t? Gave it four stars for durability, because I don’t really know yet?
customer_reviews.author: swany

customer_reviews.title: I liked this mat because it is a little longer than ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked this mat because it is a little longer than other mats that I have used. I'm a 6'2" dude and having the extra length is great. The best part about this mat is that the corners don't fold up while i'm practicing. The materials used to make this mat are superb!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: Love the cork mat
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it. The cork is very comfortable against my skin and my sweaty feet do not slip on the surface. I cannot rate it’s durability until it is at least a year old. I hope it lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: S. Roof

customer_reviews.title: Cork is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Cork is so much better than rubber. Why do so many people do the wrong thing. This is a excellent mat. Thick rubber and fine cork for your body. Slightly heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jaffe

customer_reviews.title: High quality mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made yoga mat. It lays flat right out of the box. It is heavy weight with decent cushion. It may be a bit too heavy for me to carry around , but it’s a high quality mat.
customer_reviews.author: dishdiva

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful mat, plenty of grip and thick enough to offer enough cushion. Would highly recommend, not only is their product fantastic their customer support is superb
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gReat mat!
customer_reviews.text: love this mat. I don't slide at all. just enough cushion. Couldn't be happier with mat
customer_reviews.author: Bandaid12

customer_reviews.title: Great mat if you sweat a lot!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat!! I prefer to do yoga after cardio and always struggled with slipping and it made the poses that much more challenging. This mat delivers what I need, cleans easily and is very comfortable to use. Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cucinotta

customer_reviews.title: She is very happy with this mat
customer_reviews.text: Gift to a friend. She is very happy with this mat, same as her instructors mat.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Rubber
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cork mat. It has a very thin layer of cork over the top. The rest of the mat is black rubber. The description should be “Rubber Mat with Cork Top”.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader in N. NJ

customer_reviews.title: THis is a high quality mat!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat! I recently ordered this mat because I had worn my old one out and needed a good quality mat....well, this is it!!!!! I do not slip, it absorbs sweat and the people who make it are thinking about our environment! I highly recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Maria Funk

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: Love my yoga mat! I have had it for 3 months now and use it everyday. Great quality :)
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: Mine was not durable
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this mat for the first two practices, but I just found a few spots were the cork is rubbing off :( A million high fives for being sustainable in your packaging! no plastic, yes! Novel these days.
customer_reviews.author: Abbi E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Hot Yoga
customer_reviews.text: It's great to practice hot yoga on this mat and not fight with a towel on top. The cork is soft and comforting. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic yoga mat! Cushions my knees in child's pose while still firm enough for standing balance poses like dancer (which is always a challenge for me). I am ordering one for my husband and daughter! I wish I would have started yoga using this mat!!
customer_reviews.author: Interloper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This mat is very high quality, definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS Like tires
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat, IF you can handle. STRONG rubber smell. I could not. Natural Rubber doesn't smell like tires unless it has chemical additives.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. It doesn’t have the chemical smell but it is very thin and not very comfortable if you don’t put over carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Numantia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cork and rubber mix provides great cushion and grip for yoga!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This mat works great for me
customer_reviews.text: This mat works great for me. It is firm enough to be used on my rug and still be stable. It is cushy enough to be used on hardwood. No slipping in downward dog. No obnoxious smell- only a slight rubber smell. Rolls nice and tight. Really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great investment into your wellbeing and environment
customer_reviews.text: My practice got so much more pleasant since I started using this mat. It’s also light enough and rolls tightly, so it’s comfortable to carry with you when working out outside. I haven’t try cleaning it yet, but so far I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Iryna Mikhalcuk

customer_reviews.title: Grip when wet.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mat. Its holds up so well during my hot yoga class. Have not slipped and grips well when wet. Three of my friends saw it and they purchased there own. Definitely would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: darice stuckey-oglesby

customer_reviews.title: Lovely natural smell!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this mat three times in hot yoga. Works extremely well. Best part of this mat is the lovely natural smell. None of the harsh odors that I’ve had with new rubber mats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Soft, aesthetically pleasing, high quality. Heads up that its a little heavy
customer_reviews.author: kassie sarr

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat. Its so nice to workout on a natural material as opposed to tire-like mats, makes such a difference! You need to spray it a tiny bit to make it non-slip. Love love love this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Greta

customer_reviews.title: A little slippery—in hot yoga
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to get a yoga towel too. It’s a nice mat. It got slightly slippery in hot 🥵 yoga 🧘🏾‍♀️ which is normal I guess. It came on time.
customer_reviews.author: Fresia Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality...no toxic fumes like other yoga mats. Great length...Love my new yoga mat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t make it through one class before cork was coming off
customer_reviews.text: I received this mat in the mail yesterday, took it to a yoga class today, and by 20 minutes in the cork was pulling up under my feet and I ended up with little shreds of cork all over me. This mat does not seem at all as durable as the other comments seem to suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite mat!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful natural mat! I love it. The smell is very natural too, with great grip during hot yoga
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far. Just one thing to be considered. It is heavier than expected (by me)
customer_reviews.author: Corinna W.

customer_reviews.title: The mat is a nice size.
customer_reviews.text: It took a few days to get the rubber side odor to dissipate. The mat is thin, but comfortable. My feet seem to not grip as well on the mat as I thought they would.
customer_reviews.author: Pat-PA

customer_reviews.title: ... day 1 mat had a couple spots it looks like the cork is missing
customer_reviews.text: from day 1 mat had a couple spots it looks like the cork is missing. Really good on the wrists though and doesn't move at all. Overall really good, just hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: blondeholly

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: I use this mat 2-3 times a week (not as much as Much as I’d like). The cork is completely rubbed off and I find it all over myself. I expect more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love with this mat
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this mat. It was very comfortable for a sweaty class tonight. No slipping and very comfy on the knees. As far as coziness for shivasana; I laid a yoga towel down and felt so grounded and cozy. Wonderful mat so far. Will review again when used more.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Suhm

customer_reviews.title: Eco Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! No slipping and doesn't curl up on you. I bought two. They would also make an excellent gift !
customer_reviews.author: Selena Mendolia

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant mama-to-be approved!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this yoga mat. I’m 37 weeks pregnant and have used this for all of my stretching and prenatal yoga. It gives me peace of mind to know that it is non-toxic and I love the overall look of it. It’s unlike any other mat I’ve used and I couldn’t be happier with it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Justine Rubinger

customer_reviews.title: Already falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I've had this yoga mat for less than a month and it is already falling apart. The Cork is coming off of the mat. I've taken good care of it and have probably used it a total of 10 times. Very disappointed. That being said, it is extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dorwart

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: Lovely mat. No smell as advertised and strong grip. Very high quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: After first use the cork was flaking and peeling. I don't practice yoga every day however, it is a shame to spend this kind of money on a product lend to of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Civitillo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this cork yoga mat...it is so comfortable for shavasana and no slippage during pose transitions!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems great so far
customer_reviews.text: I love the natural materials, feels great on my skin and seems to do a great job as a yoga mat so far. I only have a few hours use so far but time will tell if it holds up which I think it will.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Hood

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grip especially when wet. The rubber back makes it heavy though
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think this mat is going to work very well!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice soft feel to it, but is grippy and firm at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: I’m new to yoga and so far I love this mat!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to yoga and so far I love this mat!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer laberge

customer_reviews.title: Slippery, not sticky
customer_reviews.text: Super slippery. My hand maintain position but my feet slip all over. Definitely not worth the price. Will return and order another B Mat, best mat on the market
customer_reviews.author: Megan C. Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Cork comes off mat after 1 use.
customer_reviews.text: Just after one hot class, the cork started peeling off the mat, leaving a few spots completely without the cork. Durability is terrible. That being said, the grip was great!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great mat! I love the feel of both sides
customer_reviews.text: Great mat! I love the feel of both sides! Does not slip on ANY surface! If you are looking for a eco friendly mat with amazing quality look no further!
customer_reviews.author: NerdyJourney

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I have used it for hot yoga without ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have used it for hot yoga without a towel (no slipping), barre, and Trx. It’s not too heavy and doesn’t stay damp or get stinky.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this mat is worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I returned this mat as I fail to see how it's worth the premium price. I was looking for a mat with some tackiness or texture to prevent slippage when in some asanas, but this mat has less of that than the inexpensive mat I'm currently using. For my purposes, this mat didn't cut it and isn't worth paying over $60 for.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Spiegel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! I have owned many yoga mats throughout my life but nothing as versatile as the repose cork mat. It is perfect to use at home on carpet, giving you support as well as comfort. I noticed some reviews on flaking problems but have not dealt with any problems myself. It even comes with a strap to carry it to any class. If you are into classes such as Warrior Sculpt or hot yoga, this is the mat for you. It completely absorbs any moisture and I have no problems with slipping any longer. Moral of the story, it is a great mat and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: aelaw71

customer_reviews.title: Excited to test my first cork mat
customer_reviews.text: I’m absolutely excited to test this mat in a hot studio! I just took it out the box and tried a few flows; it bubbles with pressure, so I fingered crossed it doesn’t rip in class.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gifted

product_meta.title: Repose Eco-Friendly Yoga mat, Responsibly Sourced Cork & Natural Rubber Mat for Earth and Health – 72" Long 24" Wide 4mm Thick, Non-Toxic, for Hot Yoga, Pilates and Exercise! Yoga mat Strap Included
product_meta.description:
Practicing Yoga On A Slippery / Uncomfortable Yoga Mat Is Hard! Get Our Ultimate Eco-friendly Yoga Mat Which Is Designed For Better Balance, Support & Comfort! 

What Makes Us The BEST YOGA MAT On The Market? 

Comfortable For All 
At 72" x 24" x 4 mm thick and weighing around 6 lbs, the Repose yoga mat is comfortable enough for people of all shapes and sizes. The 4mm thick yoga mat cushions hips, knees, spine, and elbows! 

Amazing Grip 
Our cork & rubber mat offers amazing grip during hot yoga. Instead of sliding or slipping, the more you sweat, the better your grip becomes! This is NOT possible with plastic yoga mats, which would need a towel to continue practicing! 

Built With Eco-Friendly Materials 
We used responsibly sourced cork and 100% natural rubber, which is sustainable. Since no trees are cut down in this process, buying the premium Repose yoga mat is choosing to be environmentally responsible. 

Hygienic 
Our naturally antimicrobial cork mat inhibits the growth of germs, mildew, mold, and bacteria which thrive on other cheap foam yoga mats. It also adds an earthly cork scent to your yoga practice. 

Non-Toxic 
Every day we learn about toxic chemicals found in our food, water, personal care, and homes. At Repose, we know that most conventional yoga mats are toxic so we created the perfect yoga mat without glues, PVC's, TPE's or other harmful chemicals. Be inspired to practice regularly knowing that your health is our highest priority! 

Easy To Clean 
We recommend cleaning your mat once a week with light use and after each practice with heavy use, especially after hot yoga.
feature_bullets: NON TOXIC MATS – Unlike other mats, Repose yoga mats do not contain glues, PVC’s, TPE’s or any harmful chemicals. We do this by using only responsibly sourced cork and natural rubber, which naturally eliminate bacteria and germs while repelling molds and mildew. Additionally, they are very easy to clean!

ECO-FRIENDLY & SUSTAINABLE – Production of these Eco-friendly yoga mats does not require cutting down cork/rubber trees. We use cork harvested by stripping down the bark of trees and 100% natural rubber. (No Recycled Rubber Tires Added like other brands.) Biodegradable and recyclable. No plastics used in production or packaging

NON SLIP SURFACES – The 4mm thick, natural cork and natural rubber padding offers you a smooth yet non-slip surface. Due to the variable nature of the cork material, slight dampening may be required. This natural rubber-bottomed mat lays flat without sliding around during your hot yoga sessions. No need for a towel when you use our mats.

DURABLE AND PORTABLE– Weighing just above 6lbs, Repose natural cork yoga mats can be conveniently transported to a yoga fitness center using the FREE yoga mat strap included! Now you have no excuses not to practice yoga at home, the beach or on the go!

SUITABLE FOR ALL YOGIS AND ATHLETES – Measuring 72” x 24” x 4mm, our natural fitness yoga mat provides ample space for all types of exercises such as hot yoga, Bikram, aerobics, and pilates. Repose cork mats make a perfect gift for both beginning and experienced yoga practitioners.
